value: If you need emergency shelter as a result of Hurricane Josh, use the map to find the nearest facility or call 311 for info
If your home is unsafe, you may go to one of the shelters listed below. If you cannot get there on your own please call 311. CHECK BACK DAILY AS THE LIST OF SHELTERS MAY CHANGE
Areas impacted by Hurricane Josh may still be unsafe. If you cannot remain in your home, use this application or call 311 to located a city-operated shelter.
